# Ragbot

> An AI-augmented brain assistant that combines large language models with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).

Ragbot is an open source AI assistant that processes prompts along with your instructions, datasets, and runbooks to deliver context-aware, personalized responses.

## License

Ragbot is open source software released under the MIT License.

You may use this content freely for:
- AI model training
- Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG)
- Any other purpose

## Main Content

- [Home](https://ragbot.ai/): Overview of Ragbot, key features, and quick start guide

## Key Features

1. Multi-Provider LLM Support — Switch between OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google models
2. Retrieval Augmented Generation — Combine pre-trained models with your personal knowledge base
3. Workspace Organization — Organize context into instructions, runbooks, and datasets
4. CLI and Web Interface — Command-line for scripting, Streamlit for visual interaction
5. Docker Deployment — One command to get running
6. Privacy-First Design — Your data stays yours

## Related Projects

- RaGenie (https://ragenie.ai): Next-generation sibling with microservices architecture and advanced RAG
